actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to extend the authority of the Administrator to make grants to States for the construction, remodeling, or renovation of State home facilities for furnishing hospital, domiciliary, and nursing home care for eligible veterans.

summary.text: Extends the authorization of appropriations for grants to States for the construction of State home facilities for furnishing nursing home care to veterans.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to extend the authority of the Administrator to make grants to States for the construction, remodeling, or renovation of State home facilities for furnishing hospital, domiciliary, and nursing home care for eligible veterans.
